pullRequest.title: SWTBot Test case for FEA exports into HTML
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed a bug in the exporter when setting the destination via keyboard
Implemented test case for exporting FEA elements to HTML
Refactored some general purpose methods for opening VirSat exporters / importers
Fixed bug with path separators on Linux systems

Closes #757

commit.message:
Fixed bug in destination field - (Task #757)

- Complete flag of HTML exporter was not set when setting the destinaton
via keyboard.

---
Task #757: SWTBot Test Case for Exporting FEA elements to HTML

Added test case for HTML exporter - (Task #757)

- Implemented test case for HTML exporter
- Extracted redundant code into general purpose methods for opening
import and export wizards

---
Task #757: SWTBot Test Case for Exporting FEA elements to HTML

Improved assertions for linux support - (Task #757)


---
Task #757: SWTBot Test Case for Exporting FEA elements to HTML

Fixed Linux bug with path separators - (Task #757)


---
Task #757: SWTBot Test Case for Exporting FEA elements to HTML

nodes.bodyText: Just a question: We don't initilize destination, will this event always trigger before we want to access the variable?
Is this comment stil relevant, should we move it into the function then?
